price: Göklerde ve yerde olan her şeyin sahibi olan Allah’ın yoluna... İyi bilin Allah’a döner ki bütün işler!
arabic: صِرَٰطِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ أَلَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَصِيرُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ṣirāṭi al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi alā ilā al-lahi taṣīru al-umūru
